content: hippo july 28 2007 materials needed -sport weight yarn approx 1 oz i used royale fashion size 3 crochet thread main color white for teeth black for eyes/nose you can use any weight yarn and the appropriate hook your hippo will just come out a different size -f hook or hook needed to obtain gauge face round 1 rs chain 6 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in next 3 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the next chain this brings you around to the other side free loops of the chain single_crochet in the next 4 chain join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 12 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 turn do not single_crochet in the slip_stitch that you used to join the last round single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet twice join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 16 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 turn do not single_crochet in the slip_stitch that you used to join the last round single_crochet in next single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 7 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 20 single_crochet round 4 chain 1 turn this time single_crochet in the slip_stitch that you used to join the last round single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet 7 single_crochet round 5 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each single_crochet across round 6 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet single_crochet decrease 5 single_crochet round 7 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each single_crochet across round 8 chain 4 turn slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet slip_stitch in last single_crochet chain 4 slip_stitch in same single_crochet finish off teeth make 2 round 1 w/ white and leaving a 6 tail chain 3 single_crochet in the back loop of the 2nd chain from hook and next back loop finish off sew to bottom of face embroider eyes and nose w/ black weave in all ends terminology abbreviation full term chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet round round st sts stitch stitches
